title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 304.9 - Religious counseling
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 304.9 - Religious counseling

State Regulations
(a) Counseling by a member of the facility's ministerial services staff will be
provided upon the written request of an inmate. (b) The facility senior chaplain or a
designated member of the ministerial services staff will be required to make a
minimum of one round per week in the SHU. (c) No inmate religious advisor or assistant
will be permitted to visit the SHU. (d) Attendance at congregate religious
services will not be permitted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
304.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
